detect.port_in_use: Port {{port}} is already in use by another application
detect.illegal_termination: Illegal termination of worker thread — possible Build 41/42 conflict
detect.permission_denied: Permission denied — cannot access required files
detect.mod_error: A mod error was detected in the server log

solutions.no_server_dir: Set the path to your server executable (StartServer64.bat) in instance settings, or install the server via SteamCMD.
solutions.executable_not_found: Download the server via SteamCMD (App ID 380870) or through Steam. Navigate to the install directory and verify StartServer64.bat exists.
solutions.java_not_found: The server should include a bundled JRE. Try reinstalling the server or verifying file integrity via SteamCMD.
solutions.classpath_not_found: The java/ directory in the server folder should contain .jar files. Try verifying the installation via SteamCMD.
solutions.out_of_memory: Increase the RAM allocation in server settings (Memory). Default is 4 GB; try 8 GB or more for larger servers.
solutions.port_in_use: Port {{port}} is in use. Stop the conflicting application or change the port in settings.
solutions.illegal_termination: This usually happens when upgrading from Build 41 to 42. Back up your settings and delete the %USERPROFILE%\Zomboid folder, then restart the server.
solutions.permission_denied: Run saba-chan as administrator, or change file permissions to allow read/write access to the server and data directories.
solutions.server_crash: Check the console.txt log for details. Common causes: mod conflicts, corrupted world data, or insufficient memory.
solutions.mod_error: A mod is causing errors. Try disabling recently added mods or check the Workshop page for compatibility updates.
solutions.save_status: This is informational. If saves are failing, check disk space and file permissions.
solutions.steamcmd_not_found: Install SteamCMD from https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/SteamCMD and ensure it's in your PATH.
